divs: Sighting DetailsEarlier today around 2:45 am cst...I was in the driveway, heading back to the house from the roadside....As out of habit I was glancing up at the sky...Tonight was especially good since it was very clear and saw nothing but stars in the sky and temps were around 50 -55 degrees... I then noticed a red object in the west (over my house) and the object was heading in a general northern pattern...At first I thought it was a plane but as I watched it, I noticed no other color lights and I didn't hear a sound...It remained in my sight for over 30 seconds because my attention was diverted to a "shooting star" that was very bright and also traveled in the same direction...By the time I looked back for the original object, it was gone...
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Meridianville
There were no other sightings in Meridianville on or around September 30th 2005
Summary: Outside in driveway of house when I noticed a red light in the western sky moving towards the north...Didn't see any other lights and no sound.
